IX.ii.1.A.1.e
.
A&A Qualification: Veterans’ Spouses Entitled to Additional Compensation
Per
38 CFR 3.351(a)(2)
, increased compensation is payable to a Veteran by reason of the Veteran’s spouse being in need of A&A.
Note
:  This provision applies only to Veterans who are entitled to receive additional compensation for a spouse.
